title: Shadcn + Platzi: Admin Template
description: A full-stack admin dashboard template built with React, Shadcn, and Tailwind CSS. Designed as a reference for scalable admin panels with ready-to-use components.

title: Pets Heaven: Assignment Project
description: A creative design project developed for a school assignment. It showcases an engaging UI for a fictional pet adoption platform, built with React and Tailwind CSS.

title: Coursia: E-learning Platform
description: An e-learning platform built with Nuxt, Laravel, and Bootstrap. It features video streaming, quizzes, and certification functionalities for an engaging learning experience.

title: Myanmar Hemophilia Patient Association
description: A web platform for the Myanmar Hemophilia Patient Association, built with React, Laravel, and Ant Design. It offers resources, community support, and patient information.

title: Our Team
description: A dynamic team management platform built with React, Shadcn, and Laravel. It helps organizations showcase team members, roles, and collaborations with an intuitive UI.

title: Winfinance: Loan Management System
description: A robust loan management system developed with Vue, Laravel, and Bootstrap. It streamlines loan applications, approvals, and user management for financial services.

title: Acodemy: Learning Platform
description: This is an interactive e-learning platform built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Ant Design for a sleek UI, and Laravel for a robust back-end. It offers video courses, quizzes, and progress tracking, making online learning simple and engaging. ðŸš€ðŸ“š

title: Desktop Portfolio
description: A unique portfolio website designed in a dashboard-style layout, showcasing skills, projects, and achievements. Built with modern web technologies for a responsive, interactive, and user-friendly experience.
